StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_CleanUpCandidateCriteriaCon.rma.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
--- DELETE RECORDS THAT NO LONGER MATCH RECORDS IN THE PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY TABLE DELETE CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_CONFIRMATION FROM CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_CONFIRMATION CCC INNER JOIN PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY PA ON CCC.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID = PA.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID WHERE CCC.CONTRACT_ID != PA.CONTRACT_ID OR PA.CONTRACT_ID IS NULL
--- DELETE RECORDS THAT NO LONGER MATCH RECORDS IN THE QSN TABLE DELETE CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_CONFIRMATION FROM CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_CONFIRMATION CCC INNER JOIN QSN ON CCC.QSN = QSN.QSN_ID WHERE CCC.CONTRACT_ID != QSN.CONTRACT_ID OR QSN.CONTRACT_ID IS NULL
--- DELETE RECORDS FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE NO LONGER CONTRACT/POOLEES DELETE CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_CONFIRMATION FROM CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_CONFIRMATION CCC INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON (CCC.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = (SELECT MAX(CS2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS CS2 WHERE CS2.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID)) WHERE CS.DISPOSITION_CODE != 'K'
